name: Viewergames Arcade
summary:
A games collection specifically tailored to be used by streamers and being played with their their viewers. Each viewer can join in and take part in the current game. 
A lot of Twitch integration features are implemented for the best interactive experience: 
- Has a stream overlay and panel extension as frontend and controlls for the viewers 
- Channel Points integration (use Channel Points for in-game actions and items) 
- Bits integration (support the streamer and get goodies in-game) 
- Persistant player/viewer inventory 
- Totaly chaos and mayhem :-D
